39741.affected_area: Vernon, Salmon Arm and Surrounding Areas
live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Several areas have had services restored. Technicians continue to bring remaining areas back online.
Shaw Technicians are on standby to restore our services once power to the area has been restored.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39741.summary: Some customers in Vernon, Salmon Arm and Surrounding Areas eare experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39741.title: July 18 – Vernon, Salmon Arm and Surrounding Areas | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
